verses.verse: When the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H871>Atharim,<s%> then he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7617>took<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of them <S%H7628>captive.<s%>

So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5087>made<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> Thou wilt <S%H5414>indeed<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> then I will <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> up the <S%H3669>Canaanites;<s%> then they <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them and their <S%H5892>cities.<s%> Thus the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

Then they <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> to <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom;<s%> and the <S%H5315>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H9527>became<s%> <S%H9527>impatient<s%> because of the <S%H1870>journey.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> have you <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? For <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and we <S%H6973>loathe<s%> this <S%H7052>miserable<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H8314>serpents<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> and they <S%H5391>bit<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> so that <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and you; <S%H6419>intercede<s%> with the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that He may <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H5175>serpents<s%> from us." And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6419>interceded<s%> for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6213>"Make<s%> a <S%H8314>fiery<s%> [serpent,] and <S%H7760>set<s%> it on a <S%H5251>standard;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, that <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H5391>bitten,<s%> when he <S%H7200>looks<s%> at it, he shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H5175>serpent<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it on the <S%H5251>standard;<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, that <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5391>bit<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> when he <S%H5027>looked<s%> to the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> he <S%H2421>lived.<s%>
Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>moved<s%> out and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth,<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H5863>Iyeabarim,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>opposite<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> to the <S%H4217>east.<s%> <S%H8121><s%>
From <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5265>set<s%> out and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H5158>Wadi<s%> <S%H2218>Zered.<s%>

From <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> for the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it is <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H4421>Wars<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2052>"Waheb<s%> in <S%H9356>Suphah,<s%> And the <S%H5158>wadis<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%>
And the <S%H793>slope<s%> of the <S%H5158>wadis<s%> That <S%H5186>extends<s%> to the <S%H7675>site<s%> of <S%H6144>Ar,<s%> And <S%H8172>leans<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>"

And from <S%H8033>there<s%> [they continued] to <S%H876>Beer,<s%> that is the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H622>"Assemble<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that I may <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4325>water.<s%>"
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song:<s%> <S%H5927>"Spring<s%> up, O <S%H875>well!<s%> <S%H9420>Sing<s%> to it!

"The <S%H875>well,<s%> which the <S%H8269>leaders<s%> <S%H2658>sank,<s%> Which the <S%H5081>nobles<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3738>dug,<s%> With the <S%H2710>scepter<s%> [and] with their <S%H4938>staffs.<s%>" And from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> [they continued] to <S%H4980>Mattanah,<s%>
and from <S%H4980>Mattanah<s%> to <S%H5160>Nahaliel,<s%> and from <S%H5160>Nahaliel<s%> to <S%H1120>Bamoth,<s%>

and from <S%H1120>Bamoth<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> at the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%> which <S%H5921>overlooks<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H8259><s%> the <S%H3452>wasteland.<s%>
Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> your <S%H776>land.<s%> We will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> off into <S%H7704>field<s%> or <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> we will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from <S%H875>wells.<s%> We will <S%H1980>go<s%> by the king's <S%H1870>highway<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> we have <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> your <S%H1366>border.<s%>"

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> would not <S%H5414>permit<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> his <S%H1366>border.<s%> So <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H7122>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3423>took<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> to the <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%> for the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> [was] <S%H3270>Jazer.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1323>villages.<s%>

For <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> was the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and had <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> those who <S%H9301>use<s%> <S%H9301>proverbs<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H935>"Come<s%> to <S%H2809>Heshbon!<s%> Let it be <S%H1129>built!<s%> So let the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> be <S%H3559>established.<s%>

"For a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> A <S%H3852>flame<s%> from the <S%H7151>town<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon;<s%> It <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> The <S%H1167>dominant<s%> <S%H1181>heights<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

<S%H188>"Woe<s%> to you, O <S%H4124>Moab!<s%> You are ruined, O <S%H6>people<s%> of <S%H5971>Chemosh!<s%> He has <S%H3645>given<s%> his <S%H5414>sons<s%> as <S%H1121>fugitives,<s%> And his <S%H9453>daughters<s%> into <S%H1323>captivity,<s%> To an <S%H7622>Amorite<s%> <S%H567>king,<s%> <S%H4428>Sihon.<s%>

"But we have <S%H3384>cast<s%> them <S%H3384>down,<s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> is ruined as <S%H6>far<s%> as <S%H5704>Dibon,<s%> Then we have <S%H1769>laid<s%> <S%H8074>waste<s%> <S%H8074>even<s%> to <S%H5704>Nophah,<s%> <S%H5302>Which<s%> [reaches] to <S%H834>Medeba.<s%>"
Thus <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and they <S%H3920>captured<s%> its <S%H1323>villages<s%> and <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> for <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> him, for I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> and his <S%H776>land;<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>"

So they <S%H5221>killed<s%> him and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> there was <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H8300>remnant<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> him; and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land.<s%>
